TopicTitle: At work and cant play KSP, please let me know

Articles.Content: are there still confetti/too vigorously opened bag of potato chip fairings?

> 
> Thanks dude, that sucks

Download procedural fairings or another faring mod. It's simple.
Or don't use them - using stock fairings is actually worse than launching your payloads unshielded, unless you have something hugely draggy.
There are multiple threads on the fairings already. Please take the discussion to one of them.
